What is the "hedgehog concept" that E. O. Wilson proposed?

E. O. Wilson, a renowned biologist and author, introduced the concept of "hedgehog" in his book "The Social Conquest of Earth" (2011). This concept refers to a specific and focused strategy that a species or individual employs to achieve its goals. In the context of the natural world, hedgehogs are small animals known for their spiky coats. Translation: Xue Pan quickly rode his horse towards him, his mouth wide open and his eyes staring, constantly looking around. When Xue Pan passed by in front of Xianglian's horse, he was so absorbed in looking at the distance that he didn't pay attention to the nearby. Xianglian laughed and felt angry with him, so he also rode his horse behind him. When Xue Pan looked ahead, he gradually noticed that there were fewer people, so he turned around and rode his horse back. Suddenly, he looked back and saw Xianglian, who he thought was a treasure, so he hurriedly smiled and said, "I said you were a reliable person!" Xianglian laughed and said, "Hurry up and go, be careful that people see you and follow you." Saying this, he quickly rode away on his horse. Xue Pan immediately followed behind him.

paragraphs.original: 湘莲见前面人烟已稀，且有一带苇塘，便下马，将马拴在树上，向薛蟠笑道：“你下来，偺们先设个誓。日后要变了心，告诉别人的，就应誓。”薛蟠笑道：“这话有理。”连忙下了马，也拴在树上，便跪下说道：“我要日久变心，告诉人去的，天诛地灭！”一言未了，只听镗的一声，背后好似铁锤砸下来，只觉得一阵黑，满眼金星乱迸，身不由己，就倒在地下了。湘莲走上来瞧瞧，知道他是个不惯挨打的，只使了三分气力，向他脸上拍了几下，登时便开了果子铺。薛蟠先还要扎挣起身，又被湘莲用脚尖点了一点，仍旧跌倒，口内说道：“原来是两家情愿！你不依，只管好说，为什么哄出我来打我？”一面说，一面乱骂。湘莲道：“我把你这瞎了眼的！你认认柳大爷是谁！你不说哀求，你还伤我！我打死你也无益，只给你个利害罢！”说著，便取了马鞭过来，从背后至胫，打了三四十下。
paragraphs.english: Xianglian saw that there were few people in front and that there was a reed pond nearby. She dismounted, tied her horse to a tree, and laughed and said to Xue Pan, "You get off. Let's make a vow first. If you ever change your heart and tell others, you will have to keep your word." Xue Pan laughed and said, "That's a good idea." He quickly dismounted and tied his horse to a tree as well. Then he knelt down and said, "If I ever change my mind and tell someone, may the heavens and earth punish me!" Before he could finish his sentence, he heard a loud sound behind him, as if a hammer were coming down. He felt a sudden blackness and saw golden stars flying in front of his eyes. He couldn't move his body and fell to the ground. Xianglian walked up to him and saw that he was not used to being hit. She only used three-fifths of her strength and slapped him a few times on the face, and he opened his mouth to reveal his teeth. Xue Pan first wanted to get up, but was knocked down again by Xianglian using the heel of his foot. He was still shouting, "Why didn't you listen to me? Why did you trick me out of the carriage and beat me?" While he was still talking, he was cursing. Xianglian said, "You blind guy! Who do you think I am? You didn't beg, you insulted me! I can't hurt you, but I'll give you a good scare!" Saying this, he took the horse whip and hit him in the back and legs with it, giving him thirty or forty lashes.

paragraphs.original: 薛蟠的酒早已醒了大半，不觉得疼痛难禁，由不的“嗳哟”一声。湘莲冷笑道：“也只如此！我只当你是不怕打的！”一面说，一面又把薛蟠的左腿拉起来向苇中泞泥处拉了几步，滚的满身泥水，又问道：“你可认得我了？”薛蟠不应，只伏著哼哼。湘莲又掷下鞭子，用拳头向他身上擂了几下。薛蟠便乱滚乱叫，说：“肋条折了！我知道你是正经人，因为我错听了旁人的话了！”湘莲道：“不用拉旁人，你只说现在的！”薛蟠道：“现在也没什么说的！不过你是个正经人，我错了！”湘莲道：“还要说软些，才饶你！”薛蟠哼哼的道：“好兄弟－－”湘莲便又一拳。薛蟠“嗳”了一声，道：“好哥哥－－”湘莲又连两拳。薛蟠忙嗳哟叫道：“好老爷！饶了我这没眼睛的瞎子罢！从今以后，我敬你怕你了！”湘莲道：“你把那水喝两口！”

As he said this, he pulled Xue Pan's left leg several steps into the muddy area of the reed丛, making him all muddy. Then he asked, "Do you recognize me?" Xue Pan didn't answer, only moaning. Xiang Lian then threw down the whip and beat Xue Pan on the body several times with his fists. Xue Pan began to roll and shout, "My ribs are broken! I know you're a respectable person, I was wrong!" Xiang Lian said, "You have to be more humble, or I won't forgive you!" Xue Pan groaned, "Good brother..." Xiang Lian struck him two more times. Xue Pan cried out, "Good father! Please forgive this blind man! From now on, I will respect and fear you!" Xiang Lian said, "Drink some water!"

paragraphs.original: 薛蟠一面听了，一面皱眉道：“这水实在腌臜，怎么喝的下去！”湘莲举拳就打。薛蟠忙道：“我喝！我喝！”说著，只得俯头向苇根下喝了一口，犹未咽下去，只听哇的一声，把方才吃的东西都吐了出来。湘莲道：“好腌臜东西！你快吃完了，饶你！”薛蟠听了，叩头不迭，说：“好歹积阴功饶我罢！这至死不能吃的！”湘莲道：“这么气息，倒熏坏了我！”说著，丢下了薛蟠，便牵马认镫去了。

They are usually drunk and fight. It's normal to be beaten a few times. Besides, your family is notorious for being lawless and everyone knows it. Mom is just worried about you. It's easy to vent your anger. Wait a few days until your brother gets better and can go out. Then, at a banquet, the people like Jintian and Lianer can call that person to apologize and admit his mistake in front of everyone. Now, mom is acting like you're biased and spoiling him, and he's causing trouble and offending people."Translation: "Baochai laughed and said, 'This is good. He's not afraid of his mother and won't listen to anyone's advice. He's getting worse and worse every day. If he doesn't learn from his mistakes, he'll have to wake up sooner or later."

Explanation: The text describes Baochai's opinion on someone's behavior, which is getting worse and worse. Baochai believes that this person needs to learn from their mistakes and become more careful in the future.
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈和宝钗见香菱哭红了双眼，就问她是什么原因。忙赶来瞧薛蟠，见脸上身上虽有伤痕，未伤筋动骨。薛姨妈心疼至极，又发恨，骂薛蟠又骂湘莲，想要告诉王夫人，遣人寻拿湘莲。宝钗劝道：“这不是什么大事，不过他们一处吃酒，酒后反脸常情。谁醉了，多挨几下子打，也是有的。况且你们家的无法无天的人，也是人所共知的。妈妈不过是心疼的原故。要出气也容易，等三五天，哥哥好了，出得去的时候，那边珍大爷琏二爷这干人，也未必白丢开手，自然备个东道，叫了那个人来，当著众人替哥哥赔不是认罪就是了。如今妈妈先当件大事，告诉众人，倒显的妈妈偏心溺爱，纵容他生事招人；今儿偶然吃了一次亏，妈妈就这样兴师动众，倚著亲戚之势，欺压常人。””薛姨妈听了道：“我的儿，到底是你想得周到，我一时气糊涂了。”宝钗笑道：“这才好呢。他又不怕妈妈，又不听人劝，一天比一天坏。吃过两三个亏，他也该醒了。”
